: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus Prime: Well I dont want to make you do anything you dont want to do. Have Wheeljack do it. You will have to wait untill after he completes his work on the plague though.
 airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Condor:

"Sorry, sir but I can't"said Condor "I don't know if it's time to 
told you that but I have suspects about Flicker... I feel that I 
have to told you why, but I don't know if this is the right time"
